I love this song but is anyone else in love with all the little details with Powder and Jinx? Cause I am. 
Ekko scaring Powder at 0:47 is just really cute
The quick flash of Jinx at 1:50 when Powder mimics shooting the enforcerers
The way Powderâ€™s scream at 2:46 syncs up with the beat drop 
Itâ€™s kinda hard to see but at 2:50 if you look closely, you can see Jinx lip sync to the â€˜spare the sympathyâ€™ right before her eyes glow
The part at 2:57 where Powder lip syncs along to â€˜everybody wants to be my enemyâ€™ 
3:03 The way Powder hits and crumbles against the wall where the projection is like sheâ€™s trying to fight against the person sheâ€™ll become 
Just the attention to detail at 3:13 when they animate Jinxâ€™s shoulders dropping as all the enforcerers do. Itâ€™s such a tiny thing to animate that most people might not notice and they did it anyway. Itâ€™s just so good

Man, I played LoL from 2013 to 2015 and promised to never tought it ever again and I guess you could imagine my surprise when, the same game that was mostly about titty chicks that moaned when you killed them+ very addictive gameplay, managed to make such an excellent adult series?? I must admit that I was expecting it to be very fanservice-y but it didn't even fall into that.
God, the people in charge of the direction that Leage of Legends has took deserves every kind of award. I'm so so happy they realized the potential of the world/characters they created and decided to expand into them.

Ada kekuatan yg sengaja menempatkan kemiskinan utk diambil tenaga kasarnya, baik buruh, prostitusi, juga tempat pencucian uang haram. 
Sudah diatur, sama seperti penempatan kasta. Ada kasta rendah yg sengaja di ciptakan dalam kurun generasi dan waktu utk dikembangkan sebagai pekerja kasar, prostitusi juga tumbal manusia.
Anda tau? Saat ini orang yg merasa level tinggi, mereka sedang mengerjakan project besar dengan membangun teknologi pembantu robot, dengan robot maka manusia kelas rendah tidak perlu lagi dipekerjakan, 
Alasannya : 
1. Menghabiskan sumber konsumsi pangan. 
2. Ledakan populasi yg mempersempit lahan. 
3. Mengganggu pemandangan 
4. Sudah tidak relevan dibiarka hidup  

Sadis ya  ,, itulah kerja FBI dan freemason
